WorkItem.ClosedComment: Functionality added as an option to display Ilvl on the tooltip was added
WorkItem.Description:
Since there are Items of different Itemlevels with the same name now, it would be nice to see the Itemlevel behind their names in the comparison charts (and not just in the toolip - that's already very helpful though), example:
Darkbane Pendant [245] 
Darkbane Pendant [232]

Comments.Message: Aye, or perhaps just '(+)' or something, to indicate that it's Heroic. Somehow, yeah, we want to more clearly designate heroic vs normal.

A better method might be:

Darkbane Pendant
Darkbane Pendant (Heroic)

Though an option to toggle the item levels in the options menu (like toggling gem names or whatever) would be nice.
Are there Items of the same name with 3 versions? (232, 245, 258) If so, "Heroic" wouldn't be enough.
Nope, there's only ever 2 versions of an item. I'd prefer something like (+) over (Heroic), because item names can get rather long as it is.
